content.metadata: Open a web browser and visit the OrangeHRM login page by entering the URL 'https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login' in the address bar and pressing Enter.
On the OrangeHRM login page, locate and click on the 'Username' input field to prepare for entering credentials.

event.label: Username

content.metadata: From the left-hand navigation menu on the dashboard, click on the 'Performance' link to go to the Performance management section.

event.label: Performance
